credits: NoxDraconem for alpha, beta, delta and omega testing.
changes: Streamer name will now be yellow if the streamer is being featured.
Added an option to show/hide offline streamers.
Beam button will now properly be added/removed when the plugin itself is enabled/disabled.
fixes: Beam Button now properly toggles off state when the popout was closed by clicks anywhere outside of the button itself.
Beam button will no longer switch positions with other icons when switching from friends/dm's to guilds.
Update check does not return cached data anymore.
issues: Nothing I know off... can't be true... :O
